title: ICE on nightly with -Z macro-backtrace but compiles fine otherwise

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
In the context of the code at https://github.com/trillium-rs/trillium/tree/main/http, in particular [this IntoIterator implementation](https://github.com/trillium-rs/trillium/blob/main/http/src/headers.rs#L265-L284), it compiles just fine on nightly and stable, but when `RUSTFLAGS="-Z macro-backtrace"` is provided on the latest nightly, it panics the compiler. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (f8abed9ed 2021-12-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: f8abed9ed48bace6be0087bcd44ed534e239b8d8 commit-date: 2021-12-26 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'failed to lookup `SourceFile` in new context', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:500:22 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (f8abed9ed 2021-12-26) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -Z macro-backtrace -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [type_of] computing type of `headers::Headers::unknown` #1 [inferred_outlives_crate] computing the inferred outlives predicates for items in this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `trillium-http` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'failed to lookup `SourceFile` in new context', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:500:22 stack backtrace: 0: 0x10c83dee1 - ::fmt::hd5d1a709b630f79b 1: 0x10c89459b - core::fmt::write::haff82639db696176 2: 0x10c82ea1a - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h5803dbd750efee38 3: 0x10c842205 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h3c770bc34403b5cd 4: 0x10c841dec - std::panicking::default_hook::hd99d33e209290ad6 5: 0x115ae300d - core::panicking::panic_str::hae5a78ca63a9aa7f 13: 0x10c8bd179 - core::option::expect_failed::hf552ed44a43b47f6 14: 0x119245792 - ::file_index_to_file 15: 0x1193d37d8 - >::decode 16: 0x119387d60 - >::decode 17: 0x119231fb2 -
